test.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.mock

Class ScriptedMockConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.connection.Connection
      • test.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.mock.MockConnection
        • test.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.mock.ScriptedMockConnection

  • public class ScriptedMockConnection
extends MockConnection
    A specific implementation of a MockConnection which has a different number of responses which will be returned using receive, or not at all in the case that willReadBlock returns true When a response is read i.e Connection.receiveNextPacket() is called, the response number is incremented by 1
    Author:
    Psymj1 (Marcus)
